nodes.text: The Royal Museum of Alderaan was a museum located on the planet Alderaan that belonged to House Alde and served as the custodians of their homeworld's history. It was overseen by a person that held the title of Noble Curator and contained a range of priceless artifacts and relics.

During the Cold War, Duke Corwin used fake relics in the Royal Museum to transport messages to House Organa. This led to Baron Zacar Girard tasking an unidentified bounty hunter with the retrieval of the messages. The Curator Peema Ahuff also sought the return of the preserved head of Darth Bandon.
